p: The 0.7.11 release fixes several issues, some related to clocks, which prevented new routers from quickly integrating into the network. It also fixes the installer for 64-bit Windows. The release includes an update to Jetty 5.1.15 to fix this vulnerability.
As usual, the release contains more anonymity and performance improvements, and an assortment of bug fixes. Upgrading is recommended.

We already have more big improvements in development for the next two releases. Please give the developers feedback on IRC #i2p or forum.i2p and get involved, spread the word, and donate! We are still looking for volunteers to work on new and existing translations. Please volunteer on IRC #i2p.
